content:
I'm glad you liked the list! However, I have to reiterate that I'm a text-based AI assistant, and I don't have access to your location or personal experiences. I'm starting from scratch with each conversation.

To provide you with recommendations for museums in your city, I would need to know which city you're in. Could you please tell me your city or region? That way, I can give you a list of notable modern art museums in your area.

Regarding your comment about the abstract art section, I'm happy to chat with you about art, but I have to clarify that I wasn't present at your private tour, and I don't have any information about your visit. If you'd like to discuss abstract art or any other art-related topics, I'm here to engage in a conversation!
